content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
This place is great & it's definitely one of those "been there, done that"The short rib was very pricy but good nonetheless and the presentation was amazing and the staff had great energy. CALL AHEAD FOR THIS.I recommend a big party because you will have left overs.Overall our experience was great. Be prepared to drop stacks.
